issue.title: [Rust] Support casting lists and primitives to lists
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4865](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4865). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This adds support for casting between list arrays and from primitive arrays to single-value list arrays

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4865?focusedCommentId=16793608) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
